channel.title: Need Animation Help
channel.description: What Animation program is the best that is free out there? Which has the most options and is easy to use? If you could also give me the link to the website where I can download it that would be great. Thanks, Slave Scythe.

item.title: Need Animation Help
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

ImageReady is not that good in my opinion. I’ve heard ‘Flash’ is the best.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Animation Help
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Download Photoshop. That comes with ImageReady which is quite nifty for making animations. Probably not the best out there though.

Read full topic
